pullrequest.title: Small tweaks and docs for pull request #51

content.raw:
[Build failed](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/servicesim-ci-pr-any-xenial-amd64/42/consoleFull) because:

`VicinityPlugin.cc:18:47: fatal error: servicesim_competition/ActorNames.h: No such file or directory`

On my local setup, adding `generated_messages` to CMakeLists had solved it.

Pull request #51 works, I'll try just moving the include back to the header
content.html:
Build failed because:

VicinityPlugin.cc:18:47: fatal error: servicesim_competition/ActorNames.h: No such file or directory

On my local setup, adding generated_messages to CMakeLists had solved it.

Pull request #51 works, I'll try just moving the include back to the header
